title: Feature request: Ability to move full screen RDP session between monitors
author: DavidRobinsonDk
body_snippet:
Ability to move full screen RDP session between monitors, including the ability to have multiple full screen RDP sessions open at the same time.

## Expected Behavior
With mstsc.exe I can "restore" the full screen session to a window, move the window to another monitor and go back to full screen.

## Current Behavior
Currently I can see no way to do this in mRemoteNG.
If I "restore" a full screen RDP session in mRemoteNG, it gets put in in tab.

comments.author: ajw625
comments.snippet: I would really like to have this feature. Every day I turn off my monitors and the RDP windows move to my main monitor. I have to disconnect, move mRemoteNG to the second monitor, and reconnect, which is a bit slow. Sometimes there is a lag for 30 seconds or so before it is usable.
